    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isContactDeletable(String addressBookUID)
      Return true if the contact associated with the AddressBookUID can be deleted or no contact is associated with AddressBookUID, false otherwise.
      void mergeContacts(String keptContactABUID, String deletedContactABUID)
      Merge a given contact with another.
      void pendingCreateApproved(ABClientAPIPendingChangeContext context)
      Notifies the client system that a pending create it submitted has been approved by ContactManager.
      void pendingCreateRejected(ABClientAPIPendingChangeContext context)
      Notifies the client system that a pending create it submitted has been rejected by ContactManager. The client application can use the information in the context parameter to inform the user who submitted the change of its rejection.
      void pendingUpdateApproved(ABClientAPIPendingChangeContext context, ABClientAPIAddressBookUIDContainer abuidContainer)
      Notifies the client system that a pending update it submitted has been approved by ContactManager.
      void pendingUpdateRejected(ABClientAPIPendingChangeContext context)
      Notifies the client system that a pending update it submitted has been rejected by ContactManager. The client application can use the information in the context parameter to inform the user who submitted the change of its rejection.
      void removeContact(String addressBookUID)
      Removes the specified contact.
      void updateContact(XmlBackedInstance contactXML)
      Update a contact in the client system.

    • Method Detail

      • mergeContacts

        void mergeContacts(String keptContactABUID,
                 String deletedContactABUID)
        Merge a given contact with another.
        Parameters:
        keptContactABUID - the UID of the contact to keep
        deletedContactABUID - the UID of contact to be replaced

      • updateContact

        void updateContact(XmlBackedInstance contactXML)
        Update a contact in the client system.
        Parameters:
        contactXML - the updates expressed as a SOAP object

      • isContactDeletable

        boolean isContactDeletable(String addressBookUID)
        Return true if the contact associated with the AddressBookUID can be deleted or no contact is associated with AddressBookUID, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        addressBookUID - the AddressBookUID of the Contact
        Returns:
        true if the associated contact is deletable or nonexistant, false otherwise.

      • removeContact

        void removeContact(String addressBookUID)
        Removes the specified contact.
        Parameters:
        addressBookUID - the AddressBookUID of the Contact

      • pendingUpdateRejected

        void pendingUpdateRejected(ABClientAPIPendingChangeContext context)
        Notifies the client system that a pending update it submitted has been rejected by ContactManager. The client application can use the information in the context parameter to inform the user who submitted the change of its rejection.
        Parameters:
        context - the context information for the change

      • pendingCreateRejected

        void pendingCreateRejected(ABClientAPIPendingChangeContext context)
        Notifies the client system that a pending create it submitted has been rejected by ContactManager. The client application can use the information in the context parameter to inform the user who submitted the change of its rejection.
        Parameters:
        context - the context information for the change

      • pendingCreateApproved

        void pendingCreateApproved(ABClientAPIPendingChangeContext context)
        Notifies the client system that a pending create it submitted has been approved by ContactManager.
        Parameters:
        context - the context information for the change

      • pendingUpdateApproved

        void pendingUpdateApproved(ABClientAPIPendingChangeContext context,
                         ABClientAPIAddressBookUIDContainer abuidContainer)
        Notifies the client system that a pending update it submitted has been approved by ContactManager.
        Parameters:
        context - the context information for the change
        abuidContainer - the mapping between client public ids and addressbookuids for entities created by the update
